entry.title: Illuminated Events
entry.summary: COMING SPRING 2026: Luxury Picnics & Special Occassions Whether your event is intimate or grand, we focus on the details that make it truly shine.  Through preferred partner relationships with other local, experienced vendors, we can put together a dream team. We offer white glove…
entry.content:
COMING SPRING 2026: Luxury Picnics & Special Occassions

Whether your event is intimate or grand, we focus on the details that make it truly shine.  Through preferred partner relationships with other local, experienced vendors, we can put together a dream team. We offer white glove service throughout the Charlotte Metro area. Let's collab!
